alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 30 at 3:11PM PST until February 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible above 7000 feet. Accumulations of 3 to 8 inches between 6000 and 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highways 156, 157 and 158. Woods
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
